definition: قائمة qā’ima pl. قوائم qawā’im leg, foot, paw (of a quadruped); leg, foot (of furniture); pale, stake, post, prop, stanchion, pillar; pommel (of a sword’s hilt); stand, base, support; (fig.) main support, pillar; (pl. also -āt) list, roster, 801 register, index, table, schedule; catalogue; invoice, bill │ قائمة الطعام q. aṭ-ṭa‘ām menu, bill of fare; see also قوم I
